author: Daniel Greene
description:
This week in Fantasy News: Stephen King’s novella Rat is getting a film adaptation, Audible faces a class-action lawsuit over audiobook ownership, The Wheel of Time gets a major fan event, Reddit reveals the top self-published fantasy books of 2025, Stan Lee is resurrected with AI, and Magic: The Gathering goes to Middle-earth with The Hobbit. Plus—Brandon Sanderson may be building a Cosmere Disneyland, we’ve got multiple new cover reveals, Liam Hemsworth speaks on playing Geralt, and Christopher Paolini names a new Dragon Rider!

🎙️ Guest Hosts: 2 To Ramble
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@2ToRamble
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@2toramble?lang=en

02:34 Audible Class
title: AUDIBLE GETS SUED! Sanderson Theme Park? || FN
